titles.title: My God Is Any Hour So Sweet (easy nice persona

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My God is any hour so sweet From blush of morn to evening star As that which calls me to Thy feet The hour of prayer{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blest is that tranquil hour of morn And blest that hour of solemn eve When on the wings of prayer upborne The world I leave{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For then a day-spring shines on me Brighter than morn's ethereal glow And richer dews descend from Thee Than earth can know{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then is my strength by Thee renewed Then are my sins by Thee forgiven Then dost Thou cheer my solitude With hope of heaven{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No words can tell what blest relief There for my every want I find What strength for warfare balm for grief What peace of mind{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hushed is each doubt gone every fear My spirit seem in heaven to stay And e'en the penitential tear Is wiped away{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord till I reach yon blissful shore No privilege so dear shall be As thus my inmost soul to pour In prayer to Thee{/lang-eng}
